description: Custom CLI for holding utility commands written with shelljs and commanderjs, extending the and-cli
name: b-cli

scripts.configure:git: echo Ensuring git hooksPath is set to .githooks directory && git config core.hooksPath .githooks && chmod +x .githooks/*
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run format && echo Using TypeScript && tsc --version
